::Firearm/Rex/Striker::

Firearm ducks under the grenade, being hit in the leg by optic lasers. Dirt 
and pieces of bark shower his back as the grenade explodes behind him. 
Firearm jumps up, flipping in the air as he fires again at Predator.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex leaps sideways, several shots riddling his leg. He aims his gun at 
Choran, stopping himself from firing as he sees Brix jump at him (you meant 
Choran instead of Chordate, right, Minime? Chordate is a Maximal at the CF). 
Instead, he fires at Predator.
